feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Testing and Analysis
feed.subtitle: ABAP Testing and Analysis Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: ATC - Sap readiness check for 2023 S4 - error The SAP-owned namespace /0SJ1P/ is in scope. SAP objec
entry.content:
Hello All - 

 

we are running ATC for custom objects in brownfield approach , we are getting error as below - 
The SAP-owned namespace /0SJ1P/ is in scope. SAP objects cannot be checked in this case.

 

these error are appearing , when we are running for VOFM routein .. 
now the challenge is  - /0SJ1P/ in table "TRNSPACE " is have following values - 

NAMESPACE /0SJ1P/

ROLE P
LICENSE
EDITFLAG X
SSCRFLAG
SAPFLAG X
GEN ONLY
MT TYPE

i ve checked multiple blogs , there has been no solution provide people has tried multiple things , but still a final solution and approach is missing .


thanks

entry.title: DB Operation SELECT found (BSEG, see Note(s):0002431747) - ATC - S4 readiness
entry.content:
ALL -  during ATC run - error for below in the custom code

Appl. Comp. Check / Check Class / Message Code

BC-DWB-CEX-CCM / CL_CI_TEST_S4H_SEARCH_DB_OPS / SELECT

Details of Analysis

  • DB Operation SELECT found (BSEG, see Note(s):0002431747)

 

  • Finding can be suppressed with pseudo comment "#EC CI_DB_OPERATION_OK[2431747]
  • Referenced Object: BSEG (TABL)
  • Referenced Application Component: FI-GL-GL
  • Change Category of Piecelist Items: T (Technical)
  • SAP Note Number: 0002431747 (General Ledger: Incompatible changes in S
  • Simplification Item Category: I (Syntactically incompatible change of existing functionality)

 

is the above error ( red flag ) in the ATC need to ignore if so what we need to consider - 

 

- Since we are reading data from the BKPF/BSEG - that is for the GL account hence we are good ?

- there is no update / modify , insert - so we are good ?

- SAP recommend the data will still persist in BKPF/BSEG,  equivalent API & CDS are not required ? 

 

#abaper community - how are you handling it ... 

thanks

aakash

entry.title: ABAP CDS - C_CostCenterPlanActQ2001
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

Need help to analyze the standard CDS - C_CostCenterPlanActQ2001

When I open proivew in Eclipse I can see set of parameter define in this view.

But same CDS when I open in AFO or RSRT, I can see additional parameter (Like Ledger Fiscal year) which is mandatory and restrciting the output for the selection. PFA.

Please help me to identify where this additional parameter is maintained.

Thank You

Vinod

SAP S/4HANA Embedded Analytics Data and Analytics SAP Analysis for Microsoft Office

entry.title: Clarification about storage path- GOS_ATTACHMENT_LIST_POPUP
entry.content:
Hi Folks,

Recently, I used the function module GOS_ATTACHMENT_LIST_POPUP to create and display attachments for one of the purchasing transactions (ME11/ME12). The functionality works as expected.

However, considering the high frequency of attachments created by users in these transactions and the fact that we are not using a content server, there is a concern about storage usage, since all attachments are stored directly in the SAP Office.

I would like to know:

  1. Where exactly are these attachments stored in the SAP database/ SAPoffice.

  2. I have already explored some important tables such as:

  • SRGBTBREL
  • SOOD
  • SOFM
  • SOC3
  • SOFFCONT1

  1. I need to understand how these tables are linked and how I can trace and retrieve the binary content of attachments from them.

  2. Also, I would like to confirm which table stores the actual binary content.

  3. Finally, I need to determine the size of the table that holds the binary data to assess the storage impact.

Any insights on the linkage and storage structure of GOS attachments in a non-content server setup would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks for your time!

entry.title: Issue with ALV Filter Field Length Display for One Specific User
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I'm facing a strange issue with an ALV report in our SAP system.

We have a custom-defined field in the ALV output . On most user accounts, both the ALV display and the filter (selection screen) show the full 12-character length correctly.

However, for one specific user account, the filter input field only displays 10 characters, even though the ALV column itself still shows all 12 characters. This causes part of the filter value to be truncated when entering or selecting data, which affects filtering accuracy.

Has anyone experienced a similar issue? Could this be related to a user-specific layout, GUI settings, or authorization?

Any suggestions or troubleshooting tips would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

When I am trying to edit with the below edit option it is not showing the newly added field to input value into it.

and how to make it editable so that user will enter percentage value and it gets saved in the db table ?

Thanks.

entry.title: Changing LGORT for WM Staging (CO02/LB10)
entry.content:
Hey Guys,

I need your help.

My case: I create and release a new production order, execute WM Material Staging and set a TO (Foreground / Background) in Transfer Requirements. 

I want to have a different LTBP-LGORT for the material. The system takes RESBD-LGORT as standard, but I need it dynamically choosen by certain conditions . This should be done automatically in an user-exit or enhancement point.

Sadly I haven't found any suitable user-exit for that. PPCO0005, MWMTR001 or MWMTO001 don't get called (Yes, active project in CMOD) and MWMPP001 can't be used to change LGORT.

Any ideas, how I can get this done?
Please don't be to harsh to me, I'm new to SAP 😮

Greetings
Patrick

entry.title: When I called BAPI_SALESORDER_CHANGE, "Update was canceled" received from author "CHENG_MR".
entry.content:
When I called BAPI_SALESORDER_CHANGE, the internal table RETURN did not contain any error messages. However, immediately after execution, a popup appeared saying:

"Express document 'Update was canceled' received from author 'CHENG_MR'"

Why did this happen? Below is the code I wrote.

DATA : ls_partner          TYPE bapiparnr,
       lt_return           TYPE TABLE OF bapiret2,
       Lt_PARTNER          TYPE TABLE OF bapiparnr,
       ls_partnerchanges   TYPE  bapiparnrc,
       Lt_PARTNERCHANGES   TYPE TABLE OF bapiparnrc,
       ls_partneraddresses TYPE  bapiaddr1,
       lv_order_header_inx TYPE  bapisdh1x,
       Lt_PARTNERADDRESSES TYPE TABLE OF bapiaddr1.

DATA: lv_adrnr TYPE kna1-adrnr.

SELECT SINGLE adrnr INTO lv_adrnr
  FROM kna1
  WHERE kunnr = '0000001100'.


CLEAR:lt_return,lt_partner.
lv_order_header_inx-updateflag = 'U'.

ls_partner-partn_role  = 'AG'.

ls_partner-partn_numb  = '0000001100'.
ls_partner-country     = 'CN'.
ls_partner-name        = 'laogao'.
ls_partner-postl_code = '112222'.
ls_partner-city       = 'chang'.
ls_partner-street      = '222222'.
ls_partner-telephone   = '1777777777'.
APPEND ls_partner TO lt_partner.
CLEAR:ls_partner.


ls_partnerchanges-updateflag = 'U'.
ls_partnerchanges-document   = '1100000397'.
ls_partnerchanges-itm_number = '000000'.
ls_partnerchanges-partn_role = 'AG'.
ls_partnerchanges-p_numb_old = '0000001100'.
ls_partnerchanges-p_numb_new = '0000001100'.
*ls_partnerchanges-addr_link  = lv_adrnr.
APPEND ls_partnerchanges TO lt_partnerchanges.
CLEAR ls_partnerchanges.

ls_partneraddresses-country = 'CN'.
*ls_partneraddresses-addr_no = lv_adrnr.
ls_partneraddresses-name    = 'ruirui'.
ls_partneraddresses-tel1_numbr  = '16666666666'.
ls_partneraddresses-street  = 'Street'.
ls_partneraddresses-postl_cod2  = '010704'.
APPEND ls_partneraddresses TO lt_partneraddresses.
CLEAR ls_partneraddresses.

CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_SALESORDER_CHANGE'
  EXPORTING
    salesdocument    = '1100000397'
    order_header_inx = lv_order_header_inx
  TABLES
    return           = lt_return
    partners         = lt_partner
    partnerchanges   = lt_partnerchanges
    partneraddresses = lt_partneraddresses.

CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT'
  EXPORTING
    wait = 'X'.


REFRESH:lt_partner,lt_partnerchanges.

a alguien le ha pasado?

entry.title: VBA does not close spreadsheet generated by SAP
entry.content:
I was wondering if anyone could help me, as I use a script that generates files in SAP and merges the documents into one.

The problem is that I can't get the generated files to close automatically, or at least not with another macro that does that. If I close the generated spreadsheets and reopen them, the macro closes, but I can't close them after they're generated by SAP. I've tried fixing the code using AI, but without success.

Below is my code to check: the main code and the one I use to try to close:

Sub EXP()

Dim Inicio As Date
Dim SapGuiAuto, SApplication, Connection, session, WScript
Dim i As Integer
Dim empresa, LOC_NEG, Periodo, ICMS_LAYOUT, ICMS_NOME_ARQUIVO
Dim IPI_LAYOUT, IPI_NOME_ARQUIVO, statusBarText
Dim caminho As String
Dim periodoConsolidado As String
Dim caminho_BR01 As String
Dim caminho_BR02 As String

Inicio = Now
caminho_BR01 = Sheets(1).Range("C2").Text
caminho_BR02 = Sheets(1).Range("C3").Text

' SAP Conexï¿½o
If Not IsObject(SApplication) Then
Set SapGuiAuto = GetObject("SAPGUI")
Set SApplication = SapGuiAuto.GetScriptingEngine
End If
If Not IsObject(Connection) Then
Set Connection = SApplication.Children(0)
End If
If Not IsObject(session) Then
Set session = Connection.Children(0)
End If
If IsObject(WScript) Then
WScript.ConnectObject session, "on"
WScript.ConnectObject SApplication, "on"
End If

i = 6
Do
If Sheets(1).Cells(i, 1) = "" Then Exit Do

empresa = Sheets(1).Cells(i, 1)
LOC_NEG = Sheets(1).Cells(i, 2)
Periodo = Sheets(1).Cells(i, 3)
ICMS_LAYOUT = Sheets(1).Cells(i, 4)
ICMS_NOME_ARQUIVO = Sheets(1).Cells(i, 5)
IPI_LAYOUT = Sheets(1).Cells(i, 6)
IPI_NOME_ARQUIVO = Sheets(1).Cells(i, 7)

' Define o caminho de acordo com a empresa
If empresa = "BR01" Then
caminho = caminho_BR01
ElseIf empresa = "BR02" Then
caminho = caminho_BR02
Else
caminho = "C:\Temp"
End If

'--------- ICMS ----------
ICMS_NOME_ARQUIVO = GeraNomeUnicoArquivo(caminho, ICMS_NOME_ARQUIVO)
session.findById("wnd[0]").maximize
session.findById("wnd[0]/tbar[0]/okcd").Text = "/N/FHG/AII07"
session.findById("wnd[0]").sendVKey 0
session.findById("wnd[0]").sendVKey 4
session.findById("wnd[1]/tbar[0]/btn[17]").press
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/tabsG_SELONETABSTRIP/tabpTAB001/ssubSUBSCR_PRESEL:SAPLSDH4:0220/sub:SAPLSDH4:0220/ctxtG_SELFLD_TAB-LOW[1,24]").Text = empresa
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/tabsG_SELONETABSTRIP/tabpTAB001/ssubSUBSCR_PRESEL:SAPLSDH4:0220/sub:SAPLSDH4:0220/ctxtG_SELFLD_TAB-LOW[2,24]").Text = LOC_NEG
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/tabsG_SELONETABSTRIP/tabpTAB001/ssubSUBSCR_PRESEL:SAPLSDH4:0220/sub:SAPLSDH4:0220/txtG_SELFLD_TAB-LOW[3,24]").Text = Periodo
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/tabsG_SELONETABSTRIP/tabpTAB001/ssubSUBSCR_PRESEL:SAPLSDH4:0220/sub:SAPLSDH4:0220/txtG_SELFLD_TAB-LOW[3,24]").SetFocus
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/tabsG_SELONETABSTRIP/tabpTAB001/ssubSUBSCR_PRESEL:SAPLSDH4:0220/sub:SAPLSDH4:0220/txtG_SELFLD_TAB-LOW[3,24]").caretPosition = 6
session.findById("wnd[1]/tbar[0]/btn[0]").press
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/lbl[12,3]").SetFocus
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/lbl[12,3]").caretPosition = 3
session.findById("wnd[1]").sendVKey 2
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/ctxtP_LAYOUT").Text = ICMS_LAYOUT
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/ctxtP_LAYOUT").SetFocus
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/ctxtP_LAYOUT").caretPosition = 12
session.findById("wnd[0]/tbar[1]/btn[8]").press
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/cntlCC_ALV/shellcont/shell").currentCellColumn = "ITEM-ATRDIN-DOCDAT"
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/cntlCC_ALV/shellcont/shell").selectedRows = "0"
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/cntlCC_ALV/shellcont/shell").contextMenu
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/cntlCC_ALV/shellcont/shell").selectContextMenuItem "&XXL"
session.findById("wnd[1]/tbar[0]/btn[20]").press
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/ctxtDY_PATH").Text = caminho
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/ctxtDY_FILENAME").Text = ICMS_NOME_ARQUIVO
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/ctxtDY_FILENAME").caretPosition = 5
session.findById("wnd[1]/tbar[0]/btn[0]").press
session.findById("wnd[0]/tbar[0]/btn[3]").press

'--------- IPI ----------
IPI_NOME_ARQUIVO = GeraNomeUnicoArquivo(caminho, IPI_NOME_ARQUIVO)
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/ctxtP_LAYOUT").Text = IPI_LAYOUT
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/ctxtP_LAYOUT").SetFocus
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/ctxtP_LAYOUT").caretPosition = 11
session.findById("wnd[0]/tbar[1]/btn[8]").press
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/cntlCC_ALV/shellcont/shell").contextMenu
session.findById("wnd[0]/usr/cntlCC_ALV/shellcont/shell").selectContextMenuItem "&XXL"
session.findById("wnd[1]/tbar[0]/btn[20]").press
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/ctxtDY_PATH").Text = caminho
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/ctxtDY_FILENAME").Text = IPI_NOME_ARQUIVO
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/ctxtDY_PATH").SetFocus
session.findById("wnd[1]/usr/ctxtDY_PATH").caretPosition = 8
session.findById("wnd[1]/tbar[0]/btn[0]").press
session.findById("wnd[0]/tbar[0]/btn[3]").press
session.findById("wnd[0]/tbar[0]/btn[3]").press

statusBarText = session.findById("wnd[0]/sbar").Text

If statusBarText = "" Then
Sheets(1).Cells(i, 😎 = "Executed Successfully"
Else
Sheets(1).Cells(i, 😎 = statusBarText
session.findById("wnd[0]/tbar[0]/btn[12]").press
End If

i = i + 1
Loop

' Considera que o perï¿½odo a consolidar ï¿½ o da C3 da planilha Script
periodoConsolidado = Replace(Replace(Trim(Sheets(1).Range("C6").Text), "/", "."), "-", ".")
periodoConsolidado = Replace(periodoConsolidado, " ", "")
If Not (periodoConsolidado Like "##.####" Or periodoConsolidado Like "#.####") Then periodoConsolidado = "SEM_DATA"

' Consolidaï¿½ï¿½o SEPARADA:
ConsolidaApenasUltimoSufixo "ICMS", caminho_BR01, periodoConsolidado, "BR01"
ConsolidaApenasUltimoSufixo "IPI", caminho_BR01, periodoConsolidado, "BR01"
ConsolidaApenasUltimoSufixo "ICMS", caminho_BR02, periodoConsolidado, "BR02"
ConsolidaApenasUltimoSufixo "IPI", caminho_BR02, periodoConsolidado, "BR02"

MsgBox "Processo finalizado com sucesso! Tempo de execuï¿½ï¿½o: " & VBA.Format(Now - Inicio, "hh:mm:ss")

 

End Sub

' Nome ï¿½nico sem FSO
Function GeraNomeUnicoArquivo(ByVal pasta As String, ByVal baseFile As String) As String
Dim i As Integer, ponto As Integer, nomeNovo As String
nomeNovo = baseFile
i = 1
Do While Len(Dir(pasta & "\" & nomeNovo)) > 0
ponto = InStrRev(baseFile, ".")
If ponto = 0 Then
nomeNovo = baseFile & "_" & i
Else
nomeNovo = Left(baseFile, ponto - 1) & "_" & i & Mid(baseFile, ponto)
End If
i = i + 1
Loop
GeraNomeUnicoArquivo = nomeNovo
End Function

' Agora com empresa informada!
Sub ConsolidaApenasUltimoSufixo(tipo As String, caminho As String, Periodo As String, empresa As String)
Dim NomePadrao As String, arq As String, pos As Integer, nomeFinal As String
Dim sufixoAtual As String, sufixoNum As Long
Dim grupoDict As Object, maiorSufixo As Long
Dim sufixosArr() As String, idx As Integer
Dim grupoArqs As String, NomeConsFinal As String, linhas As Long
Dim wbCons As Workbook, wsCons As Worksheet, wbTemp As Workbook, wsTemp As Worksheet

Set grupoDict = CreateObject("Scripting.Dictionary")
maiorSufixo = 0

If tipo = "ICMS" Then
NomePadrao = "Livro ICMS"
Else
NomePadrao = "Livro IPI"
End If

arq = Dir(caminho & "\" & NomePadrao & "*.xls*")
Do While arq <> ""
If Left(arq, Len(NomePadrao)) = NomePadrao Then
pos = InStrRev(arq, "-")
If pos > 0 Then
nomeFinal = Trim(Mid(arq, pos + 1))
nomeFinal = Left(nomeFinal, InStrRev(nomeFinal, ".") - 1)
Else
nomeFinal = Left(arq, InStrRev(arq, ".") - 1)
End If

If InStrRev(nomeFinal, "_") > 0 Then
sufixoAtual = Mid(nomeFinal, InStrRev(nomeFinal, "_") + 1)
If IsNumeric(sufixoAtual) Then
sufixoNum = CLng(sufixoAtual)
If sufixoNum > maiorSufixo Then maiorSufixo = sufixoNum
If Not grupoDict.Exists(sufixoAtual) Then
grupoDict.Add sufixoAtual, caminho & "\" & arq
Else
grupoDict(sufixoAtual) = grupoDict(sufixoAtual) & "|" & caminho & "\" & arq
End If
End If
Else
sufixoAtual = ""
If Not grupoDict.Exists(sufixoAtual) Then
grupoDict.Add sufixoAtual, caminho & "\" & arq
Else
grupoDict(sufixoAtual) = grupoDict(sufixoAtual) & "|" & caminho & "\" & arq
End If
End If
End If
arq = Dir
Loop

If maiorSufixo > 0 And grupoDict.Exists(CStr(maiorSufixo)) Then
grupoArqs = grupoDict(CStr(maiorSufixo))
ElseIf grupoDict.Exists("") Then
grupoArqs = grupoDict("")
Else
MsgBox "Nenhum arquivo para consolidar do tipo " & tipo, vbExclamation
Exit Sub
End If

sufixosArr = Split(grupoArqs, "|")

If maiorSufixo > 0 Then
NomeConsFinal = empresa & " - " & tipo & "_Consolidado." & Periodo & "_" & maiorSufixo & ".xlsx"
Else
NomeConsFinal = empresa & " - " & tipo & "_Consolidado." & Periodo & ".xlsx"
End If

NomeConsFinal = GeraNomeUnicoArquivo(caminho, NomeConsFinal)

Set wbCons = Workbooks.Add
Set wsCons = wbCons.Sheets(1)
wsCons.Name = tipo & " Consolidado"
linhas = 1

For idx = LBound(sufixosArr) To UBound(sufixosArr)
Set wbTemp = Workbooks.Open(sufixosArr(idx))
Set wsTemp = wbTemp.Sheets(1)
If idx = LBound(sufixosArr) Then
wsTemp.UsedRange.Copy wsCons.Cells(linhas, 1)
linhas = wsCons.Cells(wsCons.Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row + 1
Else
If wsTemp.UsedRange.Rows.Count > 1 Then
wsTemp.Rows("2:" & wsTemp.UsedRange.Rows.Count).Copy wsCons.Cells(linhas, 1)
linhas = wsCons.Cells(wsCons.Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row + 1
End If
End If
wbTemp.Close False
Next idx

Application.DisplayAlerts = False
wbCons.SaveAs caminho & "\" & NomeConsFinal
wbCons.Close False
Application.DisplayAlerts = True
End Sub

 

================== ================ ================= =============== ==================

>>>  This is the one I use to close, which only works if I close Excel and reopen it:

Sub Close()
Dim wb As Workbook
For Each wb In Application.Workbooks
If wb.Name <> ThisWorkbook.Name Then
wb.Close SaveChanges:=False
End If
Next wb
End Sub

============= ======================= ====================== =========================

From what I've researched, it seems to be because the Excel opened by SAP is in a second instance, and therefore the closing code doesn't execute.

I've tried several methods (which the AI suggested), but nothing worked; it always opens in a different instance.

Does anyone have a solution or know what can be done to help? I'd be incredibly grateful!

entry.title: Vendor Master Customization(Implementation).
entry.content:
Hi All,

I got a requirement from Business user, They want when End user fill data manually in BP to make Vendor Code, Normal when we save they provide me Vendor Code. But their requirement is User when save SAP not provide them Vendor Code , Only allow to save the DATA. After the finance approval only after approval or When Finance approve it by Approval Button only then they get the Vendor Code automatically on the End user Mail id.

My idea  is, We can make Custom T-CODE with the help of ABAP just like BP, And custom tables to store data.

I want to know the feasibility, Idea and solution for the requirement.

Please help me here.

entry.title: Skip Due Date Check for Specific Purchase Orders in MIGO
entry.content: When performing goods receipt in MIGO, for some purchase orders I don’t want the system to perform the due date check. How can I skip the due date check? How can this be implemented? I tried using MB_MIGO_BADI, but it didn’t work.

entry.title: Hide/Disable the Select option range in extension
entry.content:
TYPE-POOLS : scarr.
TABLES: scarr.

DATA: wa_res TYPE sscr_restrict,
wa_option_list TYPE sscr_opt_list,
wa_ass TYPE sscr_ass.

INITIALIZATION.
PERFORM initialization.

FORM initialization .
DATA: lv_program TYPE sy-repid,
wa_restriction TYPE sscr_restrict.

lv_program = sy-repid.
wa_option_list-name = 'S_TOEML'.
wa_option_list-options-eq = 'X'.
APPEND wa_option_list TO wa_res-opt_list_tab.

wa_option_list-name = 'S_CCEML'.
wa_option_list-options-eq = 'X'.
APPEND wa_option_list TO wa_res-opt_list_tab.

wa_ass-kind = 'S'.
wa_ass-name = 'S_TOEML'.
wa_ass-sg_main = 'I'.
wa_ass-op_main = 'S_TOEML'.
APPEND wa_ass TO wa_res-ass_tab.

wa_ass-kind = 'S'.
wa_ass-name = 'S_CCEML'.
wa_ass-sg_main = 'I'.
wa_ass-op_main = 'S_CCEML'.
APPEND wa_ass TO wa_res-ass_tab.
*wa_restriction

CALL FUNCTION 'SELECT_OPTIONS_RESTRICT'
EXPORTING
program = sy-repid
restriction = wa_res
* DB = ' '
EXCEPTIONS
too_late = 1
repeated = 2
selopt_without_options = 3
selopt_without_signs = 4
invalid_sign = 5
empty_option_list = 6
invalid_kind = 7
repeated_kind_a = 8
OTHERS = 9.
IF sy-subrc <> 0.
MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno
WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4 DISPLAY LIKE 'E'.
ENDIF.
ENDFORM.

entry.title: Double Periods (". . ") Not Throwing Syntax Error In ABAP.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am practicing ABAP and I have a small doubt regarding syntax.

In my code, I accidentally wrote:  IF sy-subrc = 0.
WRITE: 'Success'.
ENDIF..   

or at any ending statement if i give dot after the dot ( .. ), it gives me no syntax error and successfully activated the program. 

Is this expected behavior in ABAP? Why doesn’t the system flag this as an error?
Would appreciate if someone could clarify the reasoning behind this.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Performance Issue in BAPI 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Recently, we encountered a performance issue when updating the condition price against the material info record using the BAPI 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'.

After analysing the info record details on ME13 and BAPI, the particular PIR has a certain number (i.e., 800) of condition validity periods. Inside BAPI, there are methods 'PROCESS_VAL_PERIODS' and call the function 'COND_MNT_START' to find all existing validity periods.

This function module has the following subroutine, and it takes time to read all existing condition validity periods.

PERFORM kon_select IN PROGRAM (maintain_program)
USING t180-aktyp no no.

It has increased the runtime (30 - 60 secs) to update the condition price for a single material. Is there any alternate approach to boost the performance for price update.

Many thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: Need help to generate and send a true Excel file via email in ABAP
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have developed an ABAP program that sends an email with an attachment in Excel format. The internal table data is being successfully converted and sent as an Excel file. However, when the recipient opens the file, the following message appears:

“The file format and extension of [filename] don’t match. The file could be corrupted or unsafe. Unless you trust its source, don’t open it. Do you want to open it anyway?”

Although the file opens correctly after confirming, the client requires the attachment to be a true Excel file (without this warning message).

Currently, I am generating the Excel by converting internal table data into a tab-delimited or comma-separated format and saving it with a .xls or .xlsx extension before attaching it to the email. I understand that this only creates a text file readable by Excel, but not a genuine Excel binary or XML file.

Could anyone please suggest the best approach to generate a true Excel file (either .xlsx format or similar) directly in ABAP and send it as an email attachment?
Are there any standard SAP classes or recommended methods (like cl_fdt_xl_spreadsheet or other approaches) to achieve this?

Any guidance or example code would be highly appreciated.
Thank you in advance for your help!
